alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 03 at 8:55AM CDT until May 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Morrison and Crow Wing Counties. Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Aitkin and Crow Wing Counties. .High water and flooding continues this week along the Mississippi River. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Fort Ripley. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, This will cause minor flooding of rural areas near Fort Ripley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 9.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Mississippi River Fort Ripley 10.5 10.8 Wed 8 am CDT 10.6 10.5 10.3 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued this evening.
